A change in numbers (2016-2017) cannot produce the life you want
Hence, to make progress, you must begin by designing a worthy destination. https://t.co/5vSXwKU9x4
27. 2017 shall be a year of boundless possibilities! #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
26. When you are done developing it, display it and constantly return to it. Joshua 1:8 #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
25. Please get every member of the family involved. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
24. Commit to the process and the best interest of the marriage, rather than your personal agenda. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
23. It's ok to disagree, but make sure you reach an agreement. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
22. Address one or two issues at a time to avoid being overwhelmed. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
21. Take some time off and get to work, experts recommend 2 to 3 days. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @AyodejiJohnson7
20.To develop a family vision,ask God to show U why U are together as a couple.#FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @modupelanre @SuperSoulLifter
19. Do not exhaust all your time at work, church, helping other organisations, at the expense of your family. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
18. Pay some attention to your family in 2017. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
17. If they had known better, they would have done better. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
16.Ignorance is expensive,your parents may not have had a vision&probably never mentioned it,but get to work. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
15. Some couples do not have a vision because they are not aware of it or its benefits. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
14. Guide and protect your family and children from negative influence in your culture. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
13. You rob yourself and your Family of so much when there is no unified vision. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
12. Leverage on synergy to accomplish God's plans for your life and marriage. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
11. God commands His blessings where there is unity - one purpose, one vision. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @yomibisi @homebuildersng
10. Having a family vision would unleash God's provision. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @yomibisi
9. Thus, it makes conflict management easier! #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @excelength @LanreAgboola1
8. ...especially because the process of drafting the vision & its execution would involve every family member. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
7.This often drastically reduces conflict btw U & your spouse and btw parents & their children. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @dare_benjamin
6.Drafting & working on a family vision means that you have something you are working towards as a family. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
5. There are benefits for having a family vision. One is that it strengthens intimacy. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts @AyodejiJohnson7
4. Vision could be considered God's revelation for your life. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
3. Where there is no vision, the people perish - Proverbs 29:18 #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
2.The eye is the lamp of the body.If your eyes are healthy,your whole body will be full of light- Matthew 6:22 #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
1. Repetition is for emphasis; we cannot overemphasise how important it is to have a vision for your family. #FamilyVision #iConnectHearts
